content: you will find the basic heart pattern at suzie s stuff among many other great patterns inspired crochet designs wrote me and said that if you make the following changes on round 3 it will keep the top of the heart from curling round 3 chain 3 single_crochet in top of chain 3 from previous row 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next stitch 2 single_crochet in next stitch then single_crochet in each of the next stitches until point of heart chain one for point single_crochet in next five stitches then single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next stitch 2 single_crochet in next stitch chain three and then slip_stitch in center of heart pull the loop to the back and fasten_off
